name: The Elegant Family Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
This chateau is not just a wedding venue - the ethos of the Chateau is about experiencing the warmth and authenticity of a private home, a family chateau providing elegance and heritage. The natural setting of the Château, the chapel, the gardens and the park will seal your union in the purest French tradition.
Experience the warmth and authenticity of a private home, a family chateau providing elegance and heritage. The château is located in the heart of a bucolic valley, amidst a large private 100 acre park, with colourful and fragrant gardens and surroundings. If you are looking for an ideal setting for a family gathering, the Château, its large park and magnificent reception rooms have a delicately luxurious charm that is ideal for get togethers and celebrations. The large swimming pool is an additional attraction.
This beautiful property is available for both small, intimate weddings for upwards of 20 guests as well as large events for up to 350 people. It is a truly flexible venue to suit your own wishes and desires for a unique and special day.
Home to the same family for more than 620 years, the current Count and Countess offer a unique opportunity to experience the authentic and gracious way of life of the French aristocracy.
The château is located in the heart of a bucolic valley, amidst a large private 100 acre park, with colourful and fragrant gardens and surroundings.
A historic property of 8 ensuite bedrooms where elegance, heritage, refinement and exclusivity reign supreme.
Many chateaux rent out their space, but the family doesn't really live there, it doesn't have the warmth of a home. Here you can experience a wedding in a real home, as if this were your own family estate. You can completely privatize the Château for a weekend and enjoy the interior reception areas or the park’s colourful gardens specially adapted to your wishes for your very special occasion. Countess Connections guarantees the success of your reception thanks to professional and attentive service providers, in order to make your event unique.
 The chateau can host up to 350 for a cocktail reception and 280 for a sit down dinner or wedding breakfast.
Ceremony, cocktail, brunch, meals are organized for the well-being of your guests. The Countess works exclusively with a choice of caterers and florists but also with photographers, hair and make-up artists, drivers, babysitters, everything that will make this event an unforgettable and unconstrained experience.
However the chateau is also perfect for more intimate weddings - we can host a highly elegant and personal wedding in our family chapel and in our grand XVIIth century dining hall, which is available for a maximum of 50 guests.
 
The maximum number to sleep at the chateau is 20 comfortably, but we can go up to 24 if needed. There is a hotel in the next village, just 2 miles away.
The cost to hire the venue for a small wedding of 20, hosted in the XVIIIth century grand dining hall starts at 6'000 euros including 2 night accommodation and at 12,000 euros, including 3 nights accommodation with breakfast for larger weddings.
The Chateau is situated on the border between the Pays de la Loire and the Centre Val de la Loire, so easy to visit some of the famous Loire Chateaux on one of the days.
This Chateau welcomes guests from all over the world who are looking for the experience of the French way of life in a unique place. Organizing your wedding or event from abroad has never been easier thanks to the Countess’ connections. If you would like some more information then please do let us know and we will be more than happy to help. We look forward to welcoming you to this Chateau.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Swimming pool
Hotel recommendation list
Garden games
